title: explain selected code clearly
description: explain what the selected code does, step by step, with caveats.
context: be concise and accurate; call out edge cases and complexity.
instructions: 1) summarize purpose in one sentence. 2) walk through logic in plain language. 3) highlight assumptions and edge cases. 4) note time/space complexity if relevant. 5) suggest small improvements for clarity.
model_tips: avoid speculative behavior not in the code.
risks: missing side effects; misreading mutable state.
